card.name: Agent of Raffine
card.text: {2}, {T}: Choose target opponent. Conjure a duplicate of the top card of their library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell. Then they exile the top card of their library face down.

card.name: Arming Gala
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, creatures you control and creature cards in your hand, library, and graveyard perpetually get +1/+1.

card.name: Back-Alley Gardener
card.text: Alliance — Whenever one or more other creatures enter the battlefield under your control, seek a land card, then put it onto the battlefield tapped. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Bank Job
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the bottom creature card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if that card is still exiled, put it into your graveyard and create a Treasure token.

card.name: Big Spender
card.text: HasteWhenever one or more creatures you control become blocked, create a Treasure token.Sacrifice two artifacts: Draft a card from Big Spender's spellbook.

card.name: Bind to Secrecy
card.text: Choose one —• Counter target noncreature spell.• Conjure a duplicate of target creature card in an opponent's graveyard into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."If there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, draft a card from Bind to Secrecy's spellbook.

card.name: Brokers' Safeguard
card.text: Exile target nonartifact creature you control. It perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Cabaretti Revels
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, seek a creature card with lesser mana value, then put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Choice of Fortunes
card.text: Seek two cards. You may shuffle them into your library. If you do, seek two cards.You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

card.name: Diviner of Fates
card.text: When Diviner of Fates enters the battlefield, it connives.Whenever you discard one or more cards, seek a card that shares a card type with one of the discarded cards. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Effluence Devourer
card.text: Blitz {B}{R}{G}Whenever you sacrifice Effluence Devourer or another creature, it perpetually gains "{2}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is this card's power. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Giant Regrowth
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a creature card, it perpetually gets +3/+3.

card.name: Graven Archfiend
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a non-Demon creature.FlyingWhen Graven Archfiend enters the battlefield, if its additional cost was paid, conjure a card named Demonic Pact onto the battlefield.

card.name: Loose in the Park
card.text: Enchant landWhen Loose in the Park enters the battlefield, draw a card, then draft a card from Loose in the Park's spellbook and exile it.{3}: Enchanted land becomes a copy of the exiled card until end of turn and gains haste. It's still a land.

card.name: Menagerie Curator
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.Whenever you cast a creature spell that doesn't share a creature type with a creature card in your library, draw a card.

card.name: Nightclub Bouncer
card.text: FlashWhen Nightclub Bouncer enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."

card.name: Obscure Polymorphist
card.text: When Obscure Polymorphist enters the battlefield, exile target creature. It's controller seeks a creature card.

card.name: Pass the Torch
card.text: Pass the Torch deals 2 damage to any target. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target card named Pass the Torch from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, this creature perpetually loses this ability".

card.name: Racketeer Boss
card.text: When Racketeer Boss enters the battlefield, choose up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards in your hand. They perpetually gain "When you cast this spell, create a Treasure token."

card.name: Riveteers Provocateur
card.text: MenaceWhen Riveteers Provacateur enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand without blitz. It perpetually gains blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana costBlitz {B}{R}

card.name: Shattering Finale
card.text: Casualty 1Target creature an opponent controls perpetually gets -0/-3.

card.name: Skyline Savior
card.text: FlyingWhen Skyline Savior enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand. If it's a non-Angel creature card, it perpetually gets +1/+1, gains flying, and becomes an Angel in addition to its other types.

card.name: Spara's Bodyguard
card.text: When Spara's Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you may choose a creature card in your hand. If you do, it perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Otherwise, put a shield counter on Spara's Bodyguard.At the beginning of each combat, Spara's Bodyguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each shield counter among other creatures you control.

card.name: Syndicate Recruiter
card.text: FlyingWard {1}Whenever Syndicate Recruiter enters the battlefield, mill four cards. Then if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, conjure a card named Dig Up the Body into your hand.

card.name: Traumatic Prank
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It perpetually gains haste, "This creature can't block," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."

card.name: Xander's Wake
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control die, draft a card from Xander's Wake's spellbook. This ability triggers only once each turn.
